statements: UPDATE EducationalOpportunities SET organization_name = 'ABC Education Center', status = 'Active' WHERE opportunity_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
UPDATE EducationalOpportunities SET location = 'Virtual', end_date = '2022-12-31', status = 'Inactive' WHERE opportunity_id = '87654321-fedc-ba09-8765-4321fedcba09';
UPDATE EducationalOpportunities SET organization_name = 'School of Engineering', start_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE opportunity_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE EducationalOpportunities SET location = 'New York', status = 'Active' WHERE opportunity_name = 'Data Science Workshop';
UPDATE Opportunities SET location='New York', end_date='2023-01-31' WHERE opportunity_id=1;
UPDATE Participants SET age=25, education_level='Bachelor' WHERE participant_id=3;
UPDATE Opportunities SET location='New York', provider_name='ABC Corp' WHERE opportunity_id=1;
UPDATE Participants SET education_level='Bachelor' WHERE participant_id=2;
UPDATE recordings SET title='New Title', description='New Description' WHERE recording_id=1;
UPDATE educational_opportunities SET location='New Location', start_date='2022-09-01', end_date='2022-09-30' WHERE opportunity_id=2;
UPDATE recordings SET description = 'Updated description', title = 'New Title' WHERE recording_id = 1;
UPDATE educational_opportunities SET location = 'New Location', organization = 'New Organization' WHERE opportunity_id = 2;
UPDATE opportunities SET start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE opportunity_id = 1;
UPDATE participants SET contact_email = 'example@email.com', registration_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE opportunities SET is_active = TRUE WHERE opportunity_id = 1;
UPDATE participants SET contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE participant_id = 3;
